directions.text: Cream together 1 stick of butter with 1 c. brown sugar. When blended together added 1 tbs vanilla and 5 beaten eggs. Then mix in 1.5 c whole wheat flour, 1/2 c. flour, 2 tsp. baking powder, 1 tsp. baking soda, 1 tsp. salt. Once that is mixed together, add 5 c. oatemal and 1 package of chocolate chips.

Spoon out in balls about 1/2 the size of ping pong balls onto a greased pan or a pan lined with parchment paper. Bake at 375 F until firm - they should feel firm and not soft. remove from oven immediately, and place cookies on a cooling rack. Bake at 375F for about 12 minutes.
